resources.string:
Android is a mobile operating system based on a modified version of the Linux kernel and other open source software, designed primarily for touchscreen mobile devices such as smart phones and tablets.

 Introducing Android 11.Meet the OS that’s optimized for how you use your phone. Helping you manage conversations. And organize your day. With even more tools and privacy controls that put you in charge.
 Choices for work, gaming, 5G streaming and anything else. There’s over 24,000 phones and tablets that run on Android. So no matter what you’re looking for, there’s something for you. The newest OS updates. The biggest announcements. The most recent platform news. If it’s new in the world of Android, you can find it here.
